name: Arc'teryx Konseal FL Gore-Tex Approach Shoes - Men's
description: Push higher and travel lighter in the vertical world. The light and agile Konseal FL GTX shoe is designed for technical approaches and day hikes where speed and weather protection are key. The sticky sole provides traction in any terrain, with a climbing zone to inspire confidence when the trail approaches 5th class.Breathable ripstop mesh upper is lightweight and durable.Waterproof-breathable GORE-TEX® membrane shelter feet from the elements.Durable TPU film overlay, raised synthetic nubuck sidewalls, and rubber toecap resist abrasion and protect feet from trail bumps.Gusseted tongue keeps trail debris out.Ortholite™ footbed delivers maximum comfort, breathability and arch support.Injected EVA midsole cushions underfoot and an integrated TPU chassis adds stability and support in technical terrain.Vibram® MegaGrip™ rubber outsole provides confident footing in varied terrain.Tread pattern has climbing zone under toes and mid- and rear-foot lugs for travel on trails.
